name: GetInterviewSchedules
description:
Retrieve all interview schedules for the organization.

This tool is used to obtain a list of all interview schedules within an organization. It is ideal for managing or reviewing interview timelines and requires the 'interviewsRead' permission.

parameters.name: request_body
parameters.description: This argument is reserved for future use or special implementations as this API currently does not utilize a request body.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Ashby API
